message: Let's be fair and split it 60-40, considering I made the first offer.
Your split seems unfair considering the inflation working against me. How about we go 55-45 in my favor?
Considering the inflation is affecting you more, my new offer is 58-42. It's a better deal for you than my first one.
Alice, this is getting ridiculous.  My position gets worse with every round, and we both lose if we don't agree.  Meet me in the middle at 52-48.
I understand your concerns, but I'm not willing to meet you in the middle. My new offer is 57-43. It's still a better deal for you than my first one, considering the inflation.
